articles.title: Space Station Crew Inspects Russian Capsule For Possible Meteoroid Damage - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: Russia’s space agency said crew members on the International Space Station were inspecting a Russian capsule that may have suffered damage from a meteoroid strike.
